message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $140. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your valuation of the product. I am willing to pay $130 for it.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $135?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $128 for the product.
